page.title: 01Overview of Kirkby
page.content: Kirkby (Cherchebi) lies at the north end of the Metropolitan Borough of Knowsley and has a population of approximately 50,000. A number are employed in companies located in Knowsley Industrial Park but many, regrettably are unemployed due to migration from the area by a large number of firms. Kirkby is an area blessed with many amenities, for example a sports centre, Olympic sized swimming pool, a large library and modern town centre with an open air market close by. It is well served with public transport and is ideally situated for access to the motorway system. Most of the housing and the schools (which are well supported by the authority) have been built during the last 30 years. The area is fortunate also in the public space available.
